description: You'll never Adam and Eve it, but Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, is back down in his helter-skelter to have a butchers at the weapons of the Fallout: London mod, including the Plasma Powerful Lewis Gun, the Tround Pistol, and another appearance of his beloved EM-2 rifle. Quali'y!
title: Firearms Expert Reacts to Fallout: London's Guns PART 2

description: Check out some 2 player co-op gameplay of Towerborne from gamescom 2024. The game is releasing in early access on September 10th, 2024. Watch as we fight through a level and encounter the Pangojira boss!
title: 7 Minutes of Towerborne Co-Op gameplay | gamescom 2024
